entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Richibucto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to freezing rain near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with rain changing to rain near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Strait. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
